caption:
"A possibly ceramic vase-type object with dark coloring and a slender, elongated shape. The tapered rim suggests it may be designed for holding flowers or decorative purposes. While resembling a vase, the presence of intricate patterns hints at ornamental use. Found on a side table in a living room setting, near a sofa and framed artwork."

"A fabric cushion with beige tones and a rectangular shape. Soft texture and padded structure. Likely used for seating comfort. Positioned on the floor against a wall, adjacent to a patterned rug."

"A metallic radiator with white coloring and a flat, panelled shape. Horizontal grooves along its surface. Functions as a heating unit. Mounted on a wall beneath a window, with string lights above and a framed picture nearby."

"A possibly wooden furniture piece with light brown coloring and a rectangular shape. Smooth surface and sturdy structure. Likely serves as a base or support. Located on the floor near a doorway, part of an indoor residential environment."
